heading: HR00988
0: A RESOLUTION COMMENDING AND CONGRATULATING BRO. EDUARDO V. MANALO, THE EXECUTIVE MINISTER OF THE IGLESIA NI CRISTO FOR HIS SUCCESSFUL STAGING OF THE WORLDWIDE INTENSIVE PROPAGATION OF THE GOSPEL WHEREBY, WITH THE USE OF STATE-OF-THE-ART TECHNOLOGY, HE BROUGHT TOGETHER VIA VIDEO LINK LOCAL CONGREGATIONS IN THE SIX CONTINENTS OF THE WORLD IN A WORSHIP-EVANGELICAL MISSION THAT HE HIMSELF OFFICIATED ON MAY 7, 2017
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2017-05-17
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00988
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION COMMENDING AND CONGRATULATING BRO. EDUARDO V. MANALO, THE EXECUTIVE MINISTER OF THE IGLESIA NI CRISTO FOR HIS SUCCESSFUL STAGING OF THE WORLDWIDE INTENSIVE PROPAGATION OF THE GOSPEL WHEREBY, WITH THE USE OF STATE-OF-THE-ART TECHNOLOGY, HE BROUGHT TOGETHER VIA VIDEO LINK LOCAL CONGREGATIONS IN THE SIX CONTINENTS OF THE WORLD IN A WORSHIP-EVANGELICAL MISSION THAT HE HIMSELF OFFICIATED ON MAY 7, 2017
